commands.command: with fs as ( select database_id, type, cast(round(size * 8.0 / 1024,0) as int) size from sys.master_files ) select name, (select sum(size) from fs where type = 0 and fs.database_id = db.database_id) DataFileSizeMB, (select sum(size) from fs where type = 1 and fs.database_id = db.database_id) LogFileSizeMB from sys.databases db order by 2 desc
